patthana15.63:4.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.63:4.2: Nakāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.63:5.1: Kāmāvacaraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
